message:
[Alert] A campaign sent with no campaign date campaign recipients.

**Priority Level: P3**

If you see this alert, check which employer is impacted by looking at this graph: . You will see the employer id by hovering over the bars of the graph. https://app.datadoghq.com/s/d5c071843/8p9-gyi-u5h

Then, check to see if there are any campaigns for that employer processing in sidekiq: https://app.joinhandshake.com/sidekiq/busy.

@slack-incidents-spk-campaign,@slack-incidents-spark-engagement <!subteam^S022HA38ZRA>
name: Campaign Sent with No Recipients
